reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Participating in Global Forum for Migration and Development- process (GFMD)

description.narrative: "GFMD is open for UN member countries and observers. It is voluntary based intergovernmental and non-formal process by which countries can share knowledge and experiences of migration and development. Purpose of the process is to bring together best expert ise of migration and development from different countries. Dialogue between the countries is aimed at strengthening the global dialogue collaboration and partnerships as well as practical activities and results of the topic issues. GFMD process is a state -run where the host countries change each year. The host country is responsible for the budget of the process. The process includes consultative bodies such as ""Friends of the Forum"" Steerign Group and meetings and annual Conference. Finland has identifi ed in GFMD process emphazing of policy coherence and research so as puting a particular emphasis on human rights-based approach."
